Comment: Such a necessary reminder and honestly, a reality most people don‚Äôt talk about enough. When the integrity of medicines becomes uncertain, the importance of personal health practices becomes even clearer.  In traditional systems, we were always taught that the first line of defence isn‚Äôt a tablet , it‚Äôs our own internal balance. Movement, clean food, good sleep, emotional regulation‚Ä¶ these are not ‚Äúwellness trends‚Äù; they‚Äôre biological insurance.  That philosophy is at the heart of RootCause Wellness‚Ñ¢ as well. We‚Äôre building it to help people reconnect with the signals the body sends long before it reaches the point of needing intervention to strengthen immunity, energy, digestion, and calm from the inside out.  Because the most reliable healthcare is still the one we build daily, quietly, consistently through alignment, not dependency.

Headline: Medicine delivery in minutes
Comment:
One solution - The Mandatory QR codes required on packaging of top 300 drug brands and certain drug categories should be mandated across all medicine in India 

Till then as a consumer , always buy medicines from reputed pharmacy (as they normally buy from authorised company stockist mostly ) with gst bill and in presence of a full time registrated pharmacist (which is mandated by law)
Always check the medicine‚Äôs physical characteristics like color, texture, smell, and taste against what is known or described by the manufacturer.Look up the medicine on the official Central Drugs Standard Control Organization (CDSCO) or Pharmacy Council of India websites to verify the product‚Äôs registration and approval status.Consult healthcare professionals or pharmacists about any doubts regarding the medicine

Headline: Building Isomeds | High-quality medicines, made truly affordable | Cutting monthly medicine bills by 50+%
Comment:
Not sure of the reference of the 15-20%. Some of the more authentic, larger studies put the nsq (not of standard quality) levels at 3-4% for the regular supply chain and ~10% in the government supply chain. At worst, nsq levels in the government supply chain do hit 15-20% in some states like in north east and UP . 

However, no doubt prevention is any day better.
